note: CLI output rendering for CliChannel: renderAssistantMessage, renderStreamStart/Chunk/End, renderToolCall, renderToolResult, renderThinking. 15 tests, 100% stmt. TDD RED→GREEN→REFACTOR.
WebChat logic tests: 8 markdown + 14 chat-logic (parseWsMessage, applyChunk, applyDone, createUserMessage). Pure functions extracted from chat.svelte.ts. TDD RED→GREEN→REFACTOR.
WS first-message auth per ADR-019: createAuthMessage, parseAuthResponse, isAuthOk. connectWebSocket sends auth on open, waits auth_ok. 9 tests. TDD RED→GREEN.

Design tokens→Tailwind: buildTailwindColors, buildTailwindFontFamily. tailwind.config.ts imports from @axel/ui/tokens (no hardcoded values). Added error/success/warning/axel_gray. 7 tests. TDD RED→GREEN.
TS7016: marked-terminal has no type declarations. Pre-existing scaffold issue — needs .d.ts or @types/marked-terminal. DevOps scope.

CLI streaming session: createStreamSession, feedChunk, completeStream, getStreamOutput. Immutable state, token accumulation, markdown render on completion. 12 tests, 100% stmt. TDD RED→GREEN→REFACTOR.

WebChat markdown enhanced: renderMarkdownWithHighlight (async marked + shiki github-dark, 8 langs), sanitizeHtml (allowlist-based XSS prevention: strips script/style/iframe/on*/javascript:/data: URLs). 17 tests. TDD RED→GREEN→REFACTOR.

WebChat session API client: buildSessionUrl, buildSessionEndUrl, parseSessionResponse, parseSessionEndResponse, addSessionToList. Gateway /api/v1/session integration. 13 tests. TDD RED→GREEN→REFACTOR.

CLI theme singleton: migrated 8 files (18 call sites) from createCliTheme() to getCliTheme() frozen singleton. Theme object now created once per runtime. 19 new tests enforce no direct createCliTheme() in consumers. TDD RED→GREEN→REFACTOR.
